page.title: 09"Wychem" Chemical Works
page.content: Before this building became a chemical factory,it had been used by the R.A.F.at different times as a gymnasium,a chapel and a cinema,as it is very close to the former airfield of Stradishall.It is now owned by Vickers as part of their Howson-Algraphy division. Seventeen men are employed here making chemicals as ordered by their customers. They make drugs for the Sterling Health company as well as copying and soldering chemicals.They make resin which is believed to be used on the nose-cones of space rockets.Rat poison precursor is also made here -this replaces "Warfarin",the best-known product at the moment.Strict safety rules are enforced at all times and there have been no serious accidents to date.
